properties.name: user.kafka.topic
properties.description: User Topic inside the Kafka broker.

properties.name: user.kafka.partition
properties.description: Number fo Partition for the user topic in the Kafka Broker.

properties.name: user.kafka.replicas
properties.description: Number of replicas for the user topic in the Kafka Broker.

properties.name: user.kafka.retention
properties.description: Retention Period for the user topic.

properties.name: user.kafka.acks
properties.description: Number of Acknowledgments for the user topic records.

properties.name: user.kafka.retries
properties.description: Number of Retries for user topic records.

properties.name: user.kafka.requestimeout
properties.description: The timeout for requesting for the user topic producer.

properties.name: user.kafka.batch
properties.description: Batch size for the user topic records.

properties.name: user.kafka.linger
properties.description: Maximum time to buffer data in asynchronous mode for the user topic.

properties.name: user.kafka.max-in-flight
properties.description: Number of max connections for the user topic.
